nodes.text: This Tusken Raider was the sole surviving member of a village that was slaughtered by Darth Vader on the planet Tatooine. Following the slaughter, the Tusken Raider was discovered by another clan. He recounted Vader's massacre of his village to the clan's of the Tusken Raider's village to his clan. The shaman then had the Tusken Raider tied to a giant effigy in the likeness of Darth Vader, which was then set ablaze.
